persistSpace = 'externalOutput'¶
restoreValue()[source]¶

restore the value saved previously, this routine only goes stepsize towards this value if the stored value is reached returns True, otherwise False. Needs to be called repeatedly until it returns True in order to restore the saved value.

saveValue(overwrite=True)[source]¶

save current value

setDefaults()[source]¶
setValue(targetValue)[source]¶

go stepsize towards the value. This function returns True if the value is reached. Otherwise it should return False. The user should call repeatedly until the intended value is reached and True is returned.
